Package MODEL

Class PersonalShelf

java.lang.Object
MODEL.PersonalShelf
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class PersonalShelf extends Object implements Serializable
Class that represents the personal shelf associated to a player.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • isItsFull

      public boolean isItsFull()
      Retrieves he number of rows of a personal shelf.
      Returns:
      True if the shelf is true, false otherwise.

    • calculatePoints

      public int calculatePoints()
      Retrieves the points earned by positioning adjacent slots with the same color.
      Returns:
      The number of points earned by the player.

    • getSingleSlot

      public Slot getSingleSlot(int x, int y)
      Retrieves the slot in the selected position of the shelf according to the coordinates.
      Parameters:
      x - The index of the shelf's slot's row to get.
      y - The index of the shelf's slot's column to get.
      Returns:
      The slot of the shelf to get.

    • checkAdjacentSlot

      public int checkAdjacentSlot(boolean[][] visited, int x, int y)
      Retrieves the number of slot, from the slots adjacent, whose color matches with the input slot.
      Parameters:
      visited - The boolean mask of slots already visited.
      x - The row index of the slot to count the adjacency of.
      y - The column index of the slot to count the adjacency of.
      Returns:
      The number of slots with the same color of the input slot.

    • insert

      public void insert(Slot[] slots, int column)
      Inserts the slot selected (and ordered) by the player from the dashboard into a column of the personal shelf.
      Parameters:
      slots - The slots to insert in the shelf.
      column - The column to insert into the slots.

    • checkLastLine

      public boolean checkLastLine()
      Checks if the last line of the shelf is full.
      Returns:
      True if there are no grey (empty) slots in the upper line of the shelf, False otherwise.
